articles.description: Bulgarian actor Christo Jivkov has died at the age of 48.
articles.content:
Bulgarian actor Christo Jivkov has died at the age of 48.
The star - best known for his role as John the Apostle in Mel Gibson's The Passion of the Christ - passed away in Los Angeles, after a long … [+5822 chars]
